Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class DRMPlugin::SPtr< T >

Smart pointer to template type T.

Template type T must inherit GC.

Warning:
DO NOT CONSTRUCT SPtr<T> WITH ADDRESS OF LOCAL OBJECT OF TYPE T!

Definition at line 75 of file GC.h.

template<typename T>
SPtr<T>& DRMPlugin::SPtr< T >::operator= (  const SPtr< T > &  rhs  )  [inline]
 

Assignment operator.

If rhs is not the same object as this one, decreases contained pointer reference count (if it is not zero), assigns rhs's pointer to contained pointer and increases contained pointer reference count (if it is not zero).

Parameters:
rhs input, smart pointer.
Returns:
Smart pointer reference.
